title: SERVERS CRASHED PATCH 8.7 IN LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: The League of Legends servers crashed causing insanely funny moments, plays and kills! The lag was unbearable but the ending is something else! Like and Subscribe for more content like this!

body: The league of legend servers crashed and this is what happened!

replies.body:
Servers crashing does not cause lag.

If the servers crashed, there would be no ping at all and the game would end.
Why are people hating and down voting over semantics lol its a YouTube video, its meant to be entertaining!
